note.p: Career: Rural Dean of Nedre Rommerige; Rector of the district of Einebak
Proposers: James Theobald; Sir Hans Sloane; a Secretary.
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Printed list; SBI
References: John H Appleby, 'James Theobald, FRS (1688-1759), Merchant and Natural Historian' in NR 1996 vol 50 pp 179-189
Notes: Appears on PL up to and including 1753.
